directions: In a large bowl, mix together the pudding mix, buttermilk and whipped topping.  Cover and refrigerate until serving.  Just before serving, fold in the oranges and cookie crumbs.
ingredients: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
2 (11 ounce) cans mandarin orange segments, drained
1 (20 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies, crushed
title: Cookie Salad II
